articles.title: Azealia Banks’ promoters hit back at controversial star over ‘scam’ slur - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Australian promoters of a trouble-plagued tour by the controversial American hip-hop artist are not taking her attacks lying down.
articles.content:
That attack prompted separate rebuttals from the promoters.

articles.author: Aya Elamroussi
articles.title: Polar air and a powerful winter storm put millions under winter alerts this holiday week - CNN
articles.description: For millions of Americans across a large swath of the country, the holiday week is beginning with unrelenting below-freezing temperatures made even more miserable by heavy snow expected Tuesday and Wednesday in several central and northwestern states.
